title: cygan
author: cygan
content: i am of the opinion that if you have been holding BTCitcoin for years and want to understand everything, then you should also try mining yourself and at best practice it yourself in order to understand all the interrelationships (hardware/software) in this topic that's why i have dared the first small steps with my usb antminer u2 at the beginning of this year and now I want to dare another bigger step and treat myself to a few GekkoScience compac f 200-400 gh/s to be able to operate them on the gekkoscience 7port usb hub - a rpi 4 with 8gb ram is also ready to go that's why i created this thread to maybe find some honest and trustworthy sellers who might be able to make me some good offers. preferred is the eu region to save any customs fees

comments.author: sidehack
comments.body: Bitshopper.de is the authorized reseller for the EU region. He got forced into some extra work for CE registration but, from what I understand, should have sales re-opened soon.

comments.author: cygan
comments.created_time: July 12, 2022, 03:38:02 PMLast edit: July 12, 2022, 03:49:59 PM by cygan
comments.body: i know the authorized reseller too - i ordered the 7port usb hub there last time unfortunately the usb miner i was looking for is not available at the moment... must have to be patient, which is perhaps also better... because then perhaps the BTC price rises and i must then pay less satoshis from me edit: maybe someone from Bitshopper.de is also registered here and can give more information?

comments.author: Biffa
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on July 12, 2022, 03:38:02 PMi know the authorized reseller too - i ordered the 7port usb hub there last time unfortunately the usb miner i was looking for is not available at the moment... must have to be patient, which is perhaps also better... because then perhaps the BTC price rises and i must then pay less satoshis from me edit: maybe someone from Bitshopper.de is also registered here and can give more information?I've found them quite responsive to emails

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: i have now ordered the following hardware for my new upcoming small home minigfarm:gekkoscience 7-port usb hub200w power supply with 6-pin pcie connector3x gekkosciene compac f usb miner3x noctua nf-a4x10 fans + fan holderwhen everything is there and installed, i will of course provide you with some pictures

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: yxt on July 21, 2022, 11:00:15 PMWhere did you order?usb hub and the power supply @bitschopper.dethe noctua fans @second market (ebay-kleinanzeigen) - got it alreadyand the 3 gekkos @419mining (through the kind help of a forum user from usa)  - have already arrived at the said user

comments.author: cygan
comments.created_time: July 23, 2022, 02:27:19 PMLast edit: May 15, 2023, 04:23:08 PM by cygan
comments.body: was able to purchase 3 more compac f miners... fomo is coming   i was able to buy the 3 gekko miners including 3 fans with holder and the gekkoscience hub for €800 - i think that was/is a good deal found on ebay-kleinanzeigen.de ðŸ‘

comments.author: yxt
comments.body: nice, I like the small fans & holder
